data.title: Carroll Community College
data.meta_description: Carroll Community College offers 2-year degree & transfer programs, career prep, personal development, summer camps & more.
data.text:
The Jewel of Carroll County

Carroll Community College is the #1 choice for county residents to start their Bachelor’s degree, certify a skill or earn a credential to advance their career. Carroll also offers personal enrichment classes, summer camps for kids & much more!

Mission, Vision & Values

Mission

Empowering learners. Changing lives. Building community.

Carroll Community College provides accessible, high-quality educational opportunities to advance careers, enrich lives, and strengthen the community we serve.

Vision

Carroll is our community’s first choice for learning.

Values (C-A-R-R-O-L-L)

More Than a College… A Community

Experience a vibrant community of teachers, mentors and friends at Carroll who will support your talents & aspirations and help you pursue your academic & career goals.

See What Carroll Can Offer You
